content: Has stopped opening my ebooks
Installed Authorized. Tried to open book. Does not work. Uninstalled
No option to import books. Can't succeed to open anything.
Scam
Did not open any epubs. Useless.

Horrible! At first, it wouldn't download my book and then it won't scroll past the table of contents once the book finally loaded. Then it keeps crashing. This app is not worth a dime. Just found out that Adobe Digital Editions works better and is free.

I downloaded this cos it worked amazingly on my apple devices and didn't mind paying for it as I wanted to continue using it on my android phone. But it doesn't work at all. Can't add anything onto the app. Can't log in to Adobe reader as well. Extremely disappointed.
Not able to open the books on my android device .
Keeps crashing. Can't even read the book.
I cannot open any epub files stored to me phone with this app, either free or secure, even if Adobe authorization is done successfully. Waste of time and money!
Trash. Still won't authorize. Like all Adobe software...this is worthless
I have purchase it & installed, but it was not allowed me authorse with adobe Id. It is not responded, finally I uninstalled it. Don't download this apk, it is waste of time.
Like many others here, I cannot authorize my device with my Adobe account. I enter my credentials and hit "Authorize"... and nothing happens. A disappointing waste of money.
Can't sign in with my Adobe ID. I hit "authorise" and it does precisely nothing. Useless...
Will not authorize. Freezes on authorization page.
This app isn't letting me authorize it at all and I need it for my CNA class. Either fix it or please give me my money back
Worst app! I can't open my books. Used to love this app before. Waste of money. Waste of time to download and figuring it out. . Just a waste of storage. GARBAGE APP.
Doesnt work
It is not allowing me to put in my adobe user name.
Could not authenticate. Never got a success or error message. Tried putting in bad info. No messages. Uninstalled. Refunded.

This used to be free. I just paid 2.99 and it will not let me autherize my Adobe if. So I can read nothing! I put in user name and password and click autherize and it v does nothing. No error message, no screen change. Just sits there.
Did not work.
This is an absolutely a waste of my time. This app has no options of importing books (epud) to read. Build-in stores gone. Don't bother wasting your time and money.
Can't add anything from your phone, no setting options, absolutely a waste of time and money.
User unfriendly
Does not work. No way to put epub files in.

What happened? This app used to have several built-in stores where books could be found, including thousands of classics in the public domain. Now it has nothing. It used to be free and you got a lot. Now you pay and get nothing.
Does not authriseon my device
